missing.title: Missing learning paths
missing.description: Some students have not generated their learning paths yet. Their learning paths will be created once they request their learning path for the first time.

noCompetencies.title: No competencies
noCompetencies.description: Some students have not been assigned any competencies yet. Please assign competencies to these students.

noRelations.title: No relations
noRelations.description: Some competencies have not been assigned any relations yet. Please assign relations to these competencies.
